data.title: Missouri S&T – eConnection – John McManus
data.text:
Dr. John McManus, Curators’ Distinguished Professor of history and political science, received this year’s Army Historical Foundation Award for Excellence in U.S. Army Writing for his latest book, To the End of the Earth: The U.S. Army and the Downfall of Japan, 1945.

Read More »

Dr. Mehrzad Boroujerdi, an Iran expert and vice provost and dean of S&T’s College of Arts, Sciences and Education, is quoted by Eve Sampson, a reporter for The New York Times discussing the candidates for Iran’s presidential election.
